thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 10 of 22
thread.title: Sami A.

author: Sami A.
title: Sami A.
text: LazerAway has an exceptional customer service in place. They care so much about their clients...and do everything they could to make sure that these customers are satisfied 100%. Staff are skilled, trained, and professional. Jade, Natalie, and Brittany (technician) are outstanding team of professional. Treatment facilities are very clean and lazer equipment were in good shape. I will definitely recommend them to a friend or family member.
